description.en: Lead development of modern web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Architect scalable solutions and mentor junior developers.
description.de: Leitung der Entwicklung moderner Webanwendungen mit React, Next.js und TypeScript. Architektur skalierbarer Lösungen und Mentoring von Junior-Entwicklern.

achievements: Led team of 5 developers on major client project
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

description.en: Developed responsive user interfaces and optimized application performance. Collaborated with UX designers and backend developers.
description.de: Entwicklung responsiver Benutzeroberflächen und Optimierung der Anwendungsleistung. Zusammenarbeit mit UX-Designern und Backend-Entwicklern.

description.en: Built web applications for startup clients using modern JavaScript frameworks. Gained experience in agile development methodologies.
description.de: Entwicklung von Webanwendungen für Startup-Kunden mit modernen JavaScript-Frameworks. Erfahrung in agilen Entwicklungsmethoden gesammelt.

achievements: Implemented responsive design for mobile-first approach
Participated in code reviews and sprint planning

freelance.description: Built a complete e-commerce platform with payment integration and admin dashboard.
Developed mobile app for food ordering with real-time order tracking.
